episode_event_special_live/4001_1001_030:
It looks like our shouting resonated with
everyone’s souls!
episode_event_special_live/4001_1001_050: Yeah! I can feel their cheers echoing!
episode_event_special_live/4001_1001_060: I know. I feel the heat coming off them.
episode_event_special_live/4001_1001_070:
Though, I can see a few are gettin’ a bit too
heated up...
episode_event_special_live/4001_1001_090:
I keep telling you that Ryuki’s passionate shouting
is the best!
episode_event_special_live/4001_1001_110:
The melancholy Piers obviously captured the
audience’s hearts more than anyone else!
episode_event_special_live/4001_1001_120: No, neither of you get it!
episode_event_special_live/4001_1001_130:
The song reached a new level of perfection
because of Roxie’s poison on the stage!
episode_event_special_live/4001_1001_140:
It’s nice to get compliments, but you all are
heating up...and not in a great way.
episode_event_special_live/4001_1001_160:
But I do think a competition to decide who’s the
best musician might be interesting!
episode_event_special_live/4001_1001_190:
This is sudden, but the three of us are gonna do
another live concert!
episode_event_special_live/4001_1001_200: But it’s not just gonna be a jam session...
episode_event_special_live/4001_1001_210:
It’s gonna be a showdown to determine who’s
number one!
episode_event_special_live/4001_1001_220: We’re calling it a “Special Concert Battle”!
episode_event_special_live/4001_1001_230:
It’s gonna be an exciting concert that’s slightly
different from usual!
episode_event_special_live/6801_1031_010:
We’re gonna put on the
best concert ever!
episode_event_special_live/6801_1001_010: Our prep for the concert is all complete!
episode_event_special_live/6801_1001_020:
Now all we have to do is wait for the show
to begin!
episode_event_special_live/6801_1001_030: I’m so excited! I can’t wait for us to belt it all out!
episode_event_special_live/6801_1001_040:
Let’s show them what happens when the three of
us come together...
episode_event_special_live/6801_1001_050: and give them somethin’ to listen to!
episode_event_special_live/4002_1001_010: All right... We can’t back out now!
episode_event_special_live/4002_1001_020:
The three of us all have our own style of music.
I think it’s gonna be difficult to decide who’s the
best among us...
episode_event_special_live/4002_1001_030:
But I’m excited for the possibility of new music
being made through competing instead of
collaborating!
episode_event_special_live/4002_1001_040: The only problem is the rules of the battle...
episode_event_special_live/4002_1001_050:
If we don’t set some rules, even as a formality,
it’ll just be us singin’ onstage.
episode_event_special_live/4002_1001_060:
It’s a competition AND a concert! We have to
entertain everyone listening as well!
episode_event_special_live/4002_1001_090: Let’s all form a band with two other people!
episode_event_special_live/4002_1001_100: They can be pros or amateurs—doesn’t matter.
episode_event_special_live/4002_1001_110:
Then my team, Piers’ team, and Ryuki’s team can
battle it out!
episode_event_special_live/4002_1001_140: All right! Let’s go with that, then!
episode_event_special_live/4002_1001_150:
Starting now until the concert is over, we’re
all rivals!
episode_event_special_live/4002_1001_160:
I’ll be lookin’ forward to seein’ who you two
decide to invite.
episode_event_special_live/4002_1001_170:
(Someone who’d work the best with my
shouting...)
episode_event_special_live/4002_1001_180: (I remember! The burning soul I heard that day!)
episode_event_special_live/4003_1001_010:
So Lyra! Let’s belt out everything inside of
us together!
episode_event_special_live/4003_1001_020:
You haven’t forgotten that hot day when you
sang your burning soul out with Jigglypuff,
have you?
episode_event_special_live/4003_1001_030:
Of course not! And sure, I’d be more than happy
to join you!
episode_event_special_live/4003_1001_040: Thanks! I was hoping you’d say that!
episode_event_special_live/4003_1001_050: Lisia! Could you help me out as well?
episode_event_special_live/4003_1001_070:
I’m gonna be filming for a TV show about
Pokémon battles with Steven and
[Name:PlayerNickname ] that day...
episode_event_special_live/4003_1001_090: All right, no worries! Do your best at work!
episode_event_special_live/4003_1001_110:
Although...Steven and [Name:PlayerNickname ]
are off the table too, huh...
episode_event_special_live/4003_1001_140: You need a teammate, right? Let me help!
episode_event_special_live/4003_1001_150:
I’m not much of a singer, but I do know of
someone with a passionate shout!
episode_event_special_live/4003_1001_170:
Yeah! Though I don’t know if they’ll go along
with this...
episode_event_special_live/4003_1001_180: Let’s hurry up before Volkner beats us there!
episode_event_special_live/4004_1001_030: Hey, star from Sinnoh! Let’s belt it all out together!
episode_event_special_live/4004_1001_050: OK, let me explain the details...
episode_event_special_live/4004_1001_070:
I may not look it, but I do enjoy the piano, among
other things, so I think my ears are well trained!
episode_event_special_live/4004_1001_090: Yes, Kommo-o and I will join you!
episode_event_special_live/4004_1001_100: Very generous! I’d expect nothing less, Champion!
episode_event_special_live/4004_1001_120: Now we’ve got the members with the best shouts!
episode_event_special_live/4005_1001_020:
I was planning to ask Lyra and the rest too, but
I didn’t expect Ryuki to get to them first...
episode_event_special_live/4005_1001_030: It seems like you’re in a predicament, Roxie.
episode_event_special_live/4005_1001_050: I heard about the battle concert.
episode_event_special_live/4005_1001_060: Would you allow me to find your team members?
episode_event_special_live/4006_1001_010: These are the two. What do you think?
episode_event_special_live/4006_1001_020:
I chose them because their voices match the style
of your music, and because they are partnered
with Poison-type Pokémon.
episode_event_special_live/4006_1001_030:
I believe that you can make up for their lack of
experience in music with lessons.
episode_event_special_live/4006_1001_040: I see... This could be an interesting team!
episode_event_special_live/4006_1001_050:
Yeah! I bet a concert with Roxie is gonna be
so much fun!
episode_event_special_live/4006_1001_080: Since I was asked to do a job, I’ll do it right.
episode_event_special_live/4006_1001_100:
Now then, before we start practicing, let me talk
about my music...
episode_event_special_live/4006_1001_110:
If we’re gonna sing together, we should get our
hearts in sync before we work on our technique.
episode_event_special_live/4006_1001_120:
What I’m trying to express with my music is “stick
with the things that you like!”
episode_event_special_live/4006_1001_130:
But it’s hard to balance the things you have to do
and the things you want to do, so...
episode_event_special_live/4006_1001_140:
I want to rock people right outta their seats with
my songs...and make them feel positive!
episode_event_special_live/4006_1001_150:
And I want to say, no matter how difficult it gets,
or how many times I fail, I’m gonna keep sticking
with the things I like!
episode_event_special_live/4006_1001_170:
What do you think? Can you identify with
my music?
episode_event_special_live/4006_1001_180: I understand how you feel, Roxie!
episode_event_special_live/4006_1001_190: I have an important dream as a Champion too...
episode_event_special_live/4006_1001_200:
So I think I can sing with the same feelings
as you!
episode_event_special_live/4006_1001_230:
Honestly, your feelings just come off to me as
idealistic talk...
episode_event_special_live/4006_1001_250:
I guess it might not be so bad to motivate the
grunts with your music.
episode_event_special_live/4006_1001_270: Yeah, sure. I’ll sing with the same feelings as you.
episode_event_special_live/4006_1001_280: Yay! Looking forward to working with you, big sis!
episode_event_special_live/4006_1001_290: Thanks for helping as well, Oleana!
episode_event_special_live/4006_1001_300:
Please, don’t mention it. I just did what any
fan would do.
episode_event_special_live/4006_1001_310: I’ll be looking forward to the best concert ever!
episode_event_special_live/4006_1001_330:
Let’s rock the audience right outta their seats
together!
episode_event_special_live/4007_1001_010:
The reason I thought of introducing you to
these two is because of Mightyena and
Houndoom’s howls.
episode_event_special_live/4007_1001_020:
These two Pokémon tend to operate in packs in
the wild...
episode_event_special_live/4007_1001_030:
But by partnering with you, they exchanged the
strength of being part of a pack for the strength of
being independent.
episode_event_special_live/4007_1001_040:
Their howls have a hint of loneliness to them... I
think they’d work well with your melancholy, Piers.
episode_event_special_live/4007_1001_050: I see... Doesn’t sound like a bad idea.
episode_event_special_live/4007_1001_060:
I hear you, but...I have no music knowledge at all,
you know?
episode_event_special_live/4007_1001_080: Are you OK with that, Piers?
episode_event_special_live/4007_1001_100:
The two of you understand how tough the world of
battling can be...
episode_event_special_live/4007_1001_110:
So you’ll still be able to move the crowd, even
without a strong grasp of music.
episode_event_special_live/4007_1001_130:
It’ll be interesting to take on a challenge and see
whether we succeed or fail.
episode_event_special_live/4007_1001_140: Hmm... That’s how it is, huh?
episode_event_special_live/4007_1001_150:
Then yeah, I’ll join you too—though I’ll do it at
my own pace. As long as I can have some fun, I
don’t mind.
episode_event_special_live/4007_1001_160: I see. Thank you for acceptin’.
episode_event_special_live/4007_1001_170:
Maybe my songs don’t make anyone happy.
Maybe I can’t help. ♪
episode_event_special_live/4007_1001_190: It does add depth to the song...
episode_event_special_live/4007_1001_200: This is good! It’s coming together!
episode_event_special_live/4007_1001_210:
I need to think about what contraptions to set up
for the staging, too!
episode_event_special_live/4008_1001_010: I need more! You can heat up even more!
episode_event_special_live/4008_1001_020:
He’s burning up the most—even more than
the performers...
episode_event_special_live/4008_1001_030:
Haha... We have to work hard so we don’t get
left behind by Flint’s energy.
episode_event_special_live/4008_1001_040: That’s right! We’ll fire up our souls even more!
episode_event_special_live/4009_1001_010: Let’s amp it up even more!
episode_event_special_live/4009_1001_030:
Should have expected this from a professional.
We’re barely keeping up.
episode_event_special_live/4009_1001_040: This is poison in your days...poison on the stage!
episode_event_special_live/4010_1001_010: It’s almost time for the concert!
episode_event_special_live/4010_1001_020: How are your teams coming along?
episode_event_special_live/4010_1001_050:
You must be feeling good as well since you’re
asking, Roxie!
episode_event_special_live/4010_1001_060:
I feel like Toxtricity’s personality is refined
even more!
episode_event_special_live/4010_1001_070:
It’s so surprisin’ that the Toxel I left to jam with
you would grow up and evolve to be so strong.
episode_event_special_live/4010_1001_080: So that Toxtricity was from Piers?
episode_event_special_live/4010_1001_090: Yeah! Now she’s my reliable partner!
episode_event_special_live/4010_1001_100: Oh yeah! Since we’re all here...
episode_event_special_live/4011_1101_010: On the day of concert battle...
episode_event_special_live/4011_1001_020: Let the show begin! I’m going all out!
episode_event_special_live/4012_1001_010: We’re gonna start it off with our spirited shouting!
episode_event_special_live/4012_1001_020:
They’ve added Jigglypuff and Kommo-o’s singing
to Ryuki’s fiery shouting!
episode_event_special_live/4012_1001_030:
It’s making exciting music that rocks the
souls of the people listening!
episode_event_special_live/4013_1001_020:
Get ready! I’m gonna knock some sense
outta everyone!
episode_event_special_live/4013_1001_030:
Powerful, beautiful...with a bit of a danger
mixed in...
episode_event_special_live/4013_1001_040:
Adding the two of them to Roxie’s poison
on the stage...
episode_event_special_live/4013_1001_050:
is refining and elevating the music to the
next level!
episode_event_special_live/4013_1001_060:
It’s not the end yet! Here’s a big surprise
for the end!
episode_event_special_live/4013_1001_070: Let’s liven it up even more, Toxtricity!
episode_event_special_live/4014_1001_020:
We may not have the same energy as the other
teams, but we’ll sing our feelings.
episode_event_special_live/4014_1001_030:
We’ve got one last number for ya! Get ready to
etch it into your ears and hearts!
episode_event_special_live/4014_1001_050:
The melancholy from the music has the power to
hit you right in the heart!
episode_event_special_live/4014_1001_060:
When Mightyena and Houndoom’s howls overlap
with Piers’s singing...
episode_event_special_live/4014_1001_070:
don’t all kinds of memories flash through
your mind?
episode_event_special_live/4015_1001_010:
This is the end of all of the performances, but...
we want to say something.
episode_event_special_live/4015_1001_020: Thank you to everyone for listening until the end.
episode_event_special_live/4015_1001_030: We got so much power from everyone’s cheering!
episode_event_special_live/4015_1001_040:
Now then, it’s time to announce the results
from the vote.
episode_event_special_live/4015_1001_060: The team who collected the most votes is...
episode_event_special_live/4015_1001_070: I see... These are the results.
episode_event_special_live/4015_1001_080: I kind of guessed this would happen.
episode_event_special_live/4015_1001_090: Well?! Which team was the best?!
episode_event_special_live/4015_1001_120:
Therefore! All of the teams are winners for
this concert!
episode_event_special_live/4015_1001_130: All the teams won... I guess that outcome works.
episode_event_special_live/4015_1001_150: Everyone’s saying that they like each kind of music!
episode_event_special_live/4015_1001_160: All we can do is thank them, really.
episode_event_special_live/4015_1001_170:
Should we do that thing we talked about before
as a way of saying thank you?
episode_event_special_live/4015_1001_180: That’s a good idea. Let’s put on a show.
episode_event_special_live/4015_1001_190:
Everyone! We actually have one song left
for the end!
episode_event_special_live/4015_1001_200:
All three teams are going to perform this
song together!
episode_event_special_live/4015_1001_210:
Let’s fill this song with gratitude and gift it
to everyone.
episode_event_special_live/4015_1001_220: I guess the only thing us singers can do is sing...
